CustomField.formula: CASE( New_Installation_of_Module_Addition__c , "New Maintenance Agreement, No Agreement in place previously", " E-Maintenance Contract", "New Device Type Being Connected Through Aegis POC", "D- New Device Connected To Aegis", "ADS Order --- additional meter connectivity", "A- ADS Order", "New Installation (No System Installed Currently)", "C- New Install, Module Addition, or Facility Add", "Module Addition to Existing RALS System", "C- New Install, Module Addition, or Facility Add", "Facility Being added to existing Module", "C- New Install, Module Addition, or Facility Add", "Migration to RALS Plus/RALS Web3", "C- New Install, Module Addition, or Facility Add", "Renewal With Device/Platform Change", "B- Renewal With Device/Platform Change", "Renewal With Device/Platform Change", "B- Renewal With Device/Platform Change", "Not New Business --- Renewal or Expansion")
CustomField.label: New Business Category
